scripts.predeploy-resources: for FILE in ./resources/*.mp3; do ffmpeg -y -i ${FILE} -ar 16000 -ab 48k -codec:a libmp3lame -ac 1 ./dist/resources/$(basename $FILE); done && cp ./resources/*.png ./dist/resources/
scripts.deploy-lambda: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name alexa-guitar-ace --zip-file fileb://./dist/skill.zip --region us-east-1
